title: is cuck a bad word?
body: i want to change my name, is cuck an inappropriate word to have in my name?

replies.body:
i rather you have cuck instead of trump

but thats my opinion

Is Hail Hitler a bad word?
it's referencing sex, which is the sort of thing that could get you a forced name change
Cuckold is nothing more than a fetish, it would be no more inappropriate to have BDSM or Furry in your name.
